login.code.text.email: If your email address is registered, the requested code was sent via email.
login.email.login.body:
Hi {user.nameOrEmail},

You recently requested a login code for the Panel of {site}.
The following login code will be valid for {timeout} minutes:

{code}

If you did not request a login code, please ignore this email or contact your administrator if you have questions.
For security, please DO NOT forward this email.
login.email.login.subject: Your login code
login.email.password-reset.body:
Hi {user.nameOrEmail},

You recently requested a password reset code for the Panel of {site}.
The following password reset code will be valid for {timeout} minutes:

{code}

If you did not request a password reset code, please ignore this email or contact your administrator if you have questions.
For security, please DO NOT forward this email.
login.email.password-reset.subject: Your password reset code
